name: LDS Temple Match
description:
October, 2015 version. Includes the three new apostles!

A Free Match Game. Families can familiarize themselves with temples, but also with the living Apostles and Prophets. Learn the appearance and names of more than 50 Temples. Getting a match correct reveals a part of an image behind the board -- a picture of one of the living prophets and apostles. See if you can guess who it is. Fun sound effects and nice graphics. Learn Lots Software quality. All for Free!

A Single In-App Purchase of only .99 will get you all Latter-Prophets; all Latter-Day Temples (over 150 of them); "Name Puzzles" for Latter-Day Prophets and Apostles; and eliminate advertisements. Very Cool! see the pictures for more information. The "Name Puzzles" or "REBUS es" are especially fun to figure out!!!

Options are available for matching Latter-Day prophets or using them as the puzzle. You can also match current apostles and use the temples as the picture to identify. The picture puzzles similar to the old "concentration" board game will give clues to either modern day apostles or prophets.
